title: Fair compensation reflects that care work requires time and energy
description: Fair compensation reflects that care work requires time and energy
content:
Scenario: Fair compensation reflects that care work requires time and energy
    Given Sarah's care responsibilities are substantial
    And she needs sufficient income to support household
    When Sarah's compensation is determined
    Then the workplace_elohim should advocate for living wages
    And compensation should enable household flourishing, not just survival
    And Sarah should earn enough to afford care work time
    And wages should reflect that workers have care responsibilities
    And fair compensation should support care economy participation
